args: Please note that this story contains spoilers\nfor Gala Elisanne's adventurer story.
Three days prior to the Grissblum bombing...
I got you a flower, Miss Alex!
(I never would have thought back then\nI might enjoy such peaceful days.)
(My past is a bloodsoaked one, and such\nhappiness is frankly more than I deserve.\nAnd yet, I pray it lasts without end.)
Gosh-a-rooty, just LOOK at your face!\nYou've got a smile as sweet as a slice\nof pumpkin pie, darling!
Out on a picnic with the kiddos from the\norphanage, eh? Well, lemme join you!
Thank you for telling me where I could\nfind the flowers earlier, Miss Dorothy!
You are so darn welcome, sweetie buns!\nBut you better skedaddle now—I hear\nyour big brother's looking for you.
He's got an important errand for you.\nHurry up, now! Run like the dickens!
The director asked me to check up on you.\nWord on the wind is that you've decided\nto leave our bloody little profession.
The same director who is employed by\na perditionist sect to hunt heretics?
Don't look so shocked, darling! After all,\nthis is the director who taught BOTH of us\nthe ways of the killing arts.
And as I have abandoned said arts,\nthe director means nothing to me.
So you're quiting the assassin game just\nlike that? Are you SURE that's what your\nsweet little heart is telling you to do?
I do not lie to myself.
Honey, please! You were NEVER more\nradiant than when you were dragging a\nblade across some poor mark's throat.
It gave me goosebumps each time I saw\nthose cold, merciless eyes of yours—and\nI know you enjoyed it, too!
Never! I took no joy from the work!

Oh sweetie, you're never gonna be at
peace if you keep lying to yourself!
Listen, I know it's hard, but some folks just
have a certain skill set where they shine.

And yours isn't being the Grand Paladyn's
right hand OR playing nanny to a bunch of
moppets. You belong with us—in the world
of cut throats and stopped hearts!
Where I belong is for me to decide.\nThere is no need to concern yourself\nwith my future decisions.

Honey, that is a stone-cold thing to say.
Well, I suppose there's nothing for me to
do now but visit that little flower girl
who came by earlier and—
You will do no such thing!
Aaah ha ha! Oh darling, look at your face!\nJust a joke there, sweetie—little feather-\nruffler from one professional to another.
Still, it WAS nice to see the beast\ninside you flare to life once more!
Well, that was weird! My brother said\nhe wasn't looking for me at all.
Huh? What's wrong, Miss Alex?\nYour face looks all scary.
Harmony Prayer Venue:\nThe day of the Grissblum bombing
I am to give a ceremonial prayer and\nspeech in front of THIS many people?\nI can feel my stomach tensing already...
And to think you'll be speaking alongside\nArchbishop Magnus! Clearly, being the\nGrand Paladyn is no mean task.
He feels that our standing side-by-side as\nequals will show both perditionists and\nconservatives that compromise is possible.
Some may not take kindly to the notion of\ncompromise between the two factions.
I am aware the plan carries risks.\nRegardless, there is something\nI wish to convey:
Namely, the notion that even if our ideas\nare different, we can still come to an\nunderstanding with each other.
The ceremony is about to begin,\nGrand Paladyn Elisanne.
As we discussed, I'll keep an eye on the\nvenue from a distance and apprehend any\nsuspicious individuals right away.
Hold nothing back—preach\nfreely and without fear.

It is particularly reassuring knowing that
you have become my personal guard.
And might I say, you are looking rather
impressive at the moment.

These clothes serve as proof that I am
your protector, while the white hood
attests to the vow I swore to never
again be stained by blood.
I was not merely speaking of your\nappearance. But in any case, I am off.
In this land which once knew calamity,\nwe would offer up a prayer together.
We pray that we may not be visited by\nthe same tragedies that once befell us,\nand also for a new era of eternal peace.
Looks like the ceremony has started.\nHmm? Wait, who is...?
Dammit, I lost sight of her!\nWhat is she even doing here?!

Archbishop Magnus, you are a traitor
who would take the side of the hated
conservatives! May you be consigned
to an eternity in the hellfires!
That's a perditionist adherent—and he's\ngot some sort of magical implement!\nWATCH OUT, ALL OF YOU!
He dropped the device! Seize him, quickly!
The Grand Paladyn is gravely wounded!\nWe must see to it at once!
Damnation! If only I'd not been\nso far from my post...
You there! Where did you get a magical\nimplement of such deadliness?!
That woman...gave it to me.\nAlex gave it to me!
How do you know my name, cur?!
She sought the assassination!\nI only did as I was bade!
These are lies of the basest sort!
Then perhaps you can explain why you\nwere stationed so far from the venue if\nyou knew nothing of what was to come!
Hmm... You WERE a good distance from\nyour post at the time of the blast, Alex.
That is because I was pursuing\na suspicious individual!
I fear that is a weak tale at best.
Alex, personal guard to the Grand Paladyn!\nI am hereby arresting you under suspicion\nof attempted assassination!
No! You have this all wrong!
